name: CreateGithubPagesDeployment
description:
Create a GitHub Pages deployment for a repository.

Use this tool to deploy a GitHub Pages site for a repository. Requires write permissions or `pages:write` permission for GitHub Apps.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: artifact_url
parameters.description: URL of the artifact (.zip or .tar) with static assets for deployment. Must belong to the repository.

value_schema.description: The URL of an artifact that contains the .zip or .tar of static assets to deploy. The artifact belongs to the repository.

parameters.name: oidc_token_for_deployment
parameters.description: The OIDC token from GitHub Actions used to certify the deployment origin.

value_schema.description: The OIDC token issued by GitHub Actions certifying the origin of the deployment.

parameters.name: build_version_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string representing the version of the deployment build.

value_schema.description: A unique string that represents the version of the build for this deployment.

parameters.name: target_environment_for_deployment
parameters.description: Specify the target environment for the GitHub Pages deployment (e.g., 'production', 'staging').

value_schema.description: The target environment for this GitHub Pages deployment.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: artifact_url
parameters.description: The URL of an artifact that contains the .zip or .tar of static assets to deploy. The artifact belongs to the repository.

value_schema.description: The URL of an artifact that contains the .zip or .tar of static assets to deploy. The artifact belongs to the repository.

parameters.name: environment
parameters.description: The target environment for this GitHub Pages deployment.

value_schema.description: The target environment for this GitHub Pages deployment.

parameters.name: oidc_token
parameters.description: The OIDC token issued by GitHub Actions certifying the origin of the deployment.

value_schema.description: The OIDC token issued by GitHub Actions certifying the origin of the deployment.

parameters.name: pages_build_version
parameters.description: A unique string that represents the version of the build for this deployment.

value_schema.description: A unique string that represents the version of the build for this deployment.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
